title:
What is the usage of
tag element?
answer_1: It is used to create a new line in the HTML page.
answer_2: It is used to create a new paragraph in the HTML page.
answer_3: It is used to add a line break in the HTML page.
answer_4: It is used to create a new heading in the HTML page.
right_answer: It is used to add a line break in the HTML page.

title: Does element has attribute href?

right_answer: No it is for anchor tag <a>
